entry.description: Sunrise view from thirty thousand feet.
entry.content: Sunrise view from thirty thousand feet.

entry.description: I woke up at 2:55 am (EDT) to preorder an iPhone XS. Then I talked myself out of spending the money. My iPhone 7 is a great device that serves me well. But then, before dropping the kid off at school, I preordered the iPhone XS. The camera on the XS is what motivated me to upgrade my phone.
entry.content: I woke up at 2:55 am (EDT) to preorder an iPhone XS. Then I talked myself out of spending the money. My iPhone 7 is a great device that serves me well. But then, before dropping the kid off at school, I preordered the iPhone XS. The camera on the XS is what motivated me to upgrade my phone.

entry.title: Two Years Ago Today
entry.description: I started at Apple as a contractor two years ago today. And what an exciting two years it has been.
entry.content: I started at Apple as a contractor two years ago today. And what an exciting two years it has been.
